channel.title: Hamachi server
channel.description:
ok guys im making a hamachi game and i got jdk i downloaded jdk which said Java SE 7 so yea what do i have to write in classpath and path and everywhere i need to change plz help
its says i got 1.7.0 from oracle corporation so yea how to write tht in the class path and path and all the other stuff i needa change plz help
and also plz tell me how to make a hamachi game

@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“mstcool 2, post:9, topic:414357”]when i clicked run server i got this java i s not reconized as an internal ro an external command what do i do? i downloaded jdk 7 today

insiide run it says @echo off
color 0a
title Allstar-Scape
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
@pause[/quote]
This is mostly caused when you have more than one java installed…

item.title: Hamachi server
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“Camballer, post:5, topic:414357”]You have to write “C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/YOUR JAVA TYPE HERE/bin/java.exe”

where it says your java type here, put your java type.[/quote]
No… don’t listen to him…
This will be your classpath,
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
Though if a newer version comes out, you would change the ‘jdk1.6.0_11’ to the newest version.

After you have done the Classpath variable, you’re going to find the Path variable and add the code below inside it.
This will be your path,
Code: [Select]
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;

Read full topic

where it says your java type here, put your java type.

item.title: Hamachi server
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

Well click your start menu, then search “environment variables” click “edit your system environment variables” then look for %CLASSPATH% double click and you can edit it from there. Please rep if you find this helpful.

Read full topic
